website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S10+ is a high-cost 4G phone at the beginning of the 5G era. It's excellent, but you can get almost the same performance elsewhere for much less money.
pros: Most powerful processor on an Android phone
cons: No advances in low-light photography over previous model

customer_reviews.title: Be very cautious when buying
customer_reviews.text: Bought what I thought was a new S10+ for £720: 1. The first unusual sign was the 3-pin power adaptor outside of the main box. 2. No shrink wrapping on the box. 3. Fingerprints on the actual phone and slight scratches on the aluminium. 4. Started the phone and it was unusually warm on the bezels. 5. Paid for return postage for the device to add insult to injury. Clearly a customer return for a suspect unit. Very disappointed so had to return. I may have been unlucky, but it wasn't worth the risk given the price of the unit. Be careful when buying.
customer_reviews.author: Asif R

customer_reviews.title: average
customer_reviews.text: not really impressed by the phone, its ok, but I expected more upgraded from S8+, fingerprint sensor on the front sounded like a big improvement, but it fails to recognise my fingerprints way too often, seems like apple's camera solution is more reliable(I have iphone x also). Other than that I dont see much difference with S8+, so dont expect too much, there is no wow effect from the upgrade. Also the phone seems to be heavier than S8+, maybe because I opted for ceramic version. Overall makes me wonder if XS plus was a better idea.
customer_reviews.author: Vasilis

customer_reviews.title: The phone from this supplier did not work
customer_reviews.text: This phone arrived not working and the supplier asked me to send it back so that they could reboot it, I told them that i did not believe it was a brand new phone, they insisted it was. When the phone came back i plugged it in to charge but it didn't charge properly. I am now trying to get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Eb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing with some cons
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, first of all. The camera. I'm simply amazed. Worth the money. The phone looks slick, it's so thin! 2 big cons. Battery drain.. Wish they could improve battery life but iphone and Huawei arent better (most of them dont last as long as s10+ anyways) The biggest con. The chipset. In u.s. people pay the same price for a better phone with a snapdragon chipset. In uk Samsung used the Enxyon. Not fair at all, I'm disappointed in Samsung. Really, paying a lot for a phone is one thing. Paying the same price for a inferior product... ugh. Overall love it
customer_reviews.author: Midnight

customer_reviews.title: NOT the UK model
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a UK model when in fact it is the Italian model so beware before you purchase it!! I only found out through asking Samsung directly why it was missing an update and they identified it as an Italian model through the serial number. So unless you want a phone that has an outdated system, I advise against buying it from here. I have just returned it and am waiting for a refund then will be buying it from Samsung directly.
customer_reviews.author: Tahani Baragaba

customer_reviews.title: No ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Phone working well as expected. Part of the reason I actually made the preorder was the offer of ear buds as part of the deal. But Samsung has made no way of claiming them available. Will not preorder one of their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Liam O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: upgraded from the galaxy s5, the phone arrived on the day of release, very happy with the phone and i have just claimed my free galaxy buds :D
customer_reviews.author: MrShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great brand new samsung phone!
customer_reviews.text: Arrrived in 3 days. Was a bit worried after reading the other comments it being a (used) "european version" but it's a brand new Samsung phone with a seal on the box to prove it. It's just intended for the eastern european market hence the cheaper price (£200 compared with e.g. carphone warehouse). You get the european plug in the box but they added a uk plug to sort this out. Can't complain for this price. There is also a charger + cable included and some usb-adaptors and headphones present in the box (see picture). There is also a factory warranty leaflet present. Would definetly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing phone, it's just a shame a lot of the apps don't perfom as well as they would on IPhone. The camera is amazing though. The finger print reader is okay. But I had to spend £50 for a glass screen protector to work with it and it's still a bit difficult. Phone constantly picks up my debit card NFC tag and makes funny sounds. Battery life under heavy use gets me through the day just about. Speakers are amazing for watching YouTube and Netflix. I would definitely recommend this phone
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Greene

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S10+ Review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Smartphone, the fingerprint reader is requires a good press and exact position to use, but is easy to use with practice. The screen quality is top of the range from Samsung. Face recognition works well for me almost every time unlocking the device. The phone is also future proofed with Wi-Fi 6 capability but unfortunately no 5G network connectivity which will be present on the Galaxy 5G. Overall at the price of £720 with a deduction of £179.50 for Amazon Prime members this was a good value purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Burton

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone
customer_reviews.text: I initially reviewed this and said that it wasn't very good. This was owing to its having a few small scratches on the bottom of the screen. However, l have since learned that it comes with a screen protector on it, and it is that which has the scratches. It is actually a really great phone. It was delivered very promptly, and it was in pristine condition, easily seen that it had come from the factory. Moreover, the seller was very helpful and even offered me a refund for postage- costs, as I requested a refund. I have now cancelled this, owing to the scratches being on the screen protector. Definitely great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: R Low

customer_reviews.title: Modified EU version to UK
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this because I wanted a UK version, what I received was modified EU version, twice! The first one was from Connected247 the other was from Appliances Direct I returned each and got a refund, as I hadn't opened them I cannot say what condition they were in, but the refunds were easy to arrange. I was fuming that these can be advertised as UK versions, obviously Samsung won't honour a phone warranty that has been tampered with so I don't see how this is any different. Ended up having to go to argos to get one as i was sick of the to and fro. The phone itself is amazing but I cannot vouch for these modified versions.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Excellent Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to review the phone itself as they are everywhere online. I'm writing this to let others know how happy I was with my delivery service. I ordered this Wednesday afternoon and it was delivered Thursday morning. It was well packaged also. This phone is the European Model and had a separate official Samsung UK Fast Charger in the delivery box. As it is a European Model there was multiple manual's in different languages but one of them was in English. The box was sealed, although no plastic film around the box, I think this may be standard for Samsung however. Phone was brand new. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: stebyrne12

customer_reviews.title: Wrong version sent
customer_reviews.text: Advertised at least twice as "UK version". Arrived quickly but seal had a warning that it was a European version and that I'd need a Euro simcard to access. Very disappointing as this was an Amazon Prime offer, and of course the Prime days have passed. Returned and I suppose I will have to look elsewhere. So disappointing and so inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Calmac

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: this is my 1st galaxy device. I simply love it. You need to go onnthe samsung page and claim the buds from there if you pre ordered the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Onica Alin

customer_reviews.title: what a great phone
customer_reviews.text: what a great phone , this is the reason i have come away from apple , unfortunatly the phone i bought had a screen issue , but as always amazon gave me a full refund and looked after me
customer_reviews.author: markbuddy

customer_reviews.title: The software is not up to date
customer_reviews.text: This phone comes with software version One UI 1.1. Unfortunately, version One UI 2.0 is required for such things as fast wireless charging. Normally this would simply be a question of downloading this latest version but, for some reason, the phone keeps insisting that the software is up to date. Samsung suggested installing Samsung Switch - this makes no difference. So I am stuck with an out of date software version until such time as this problem is resolved. Great phone. Usual problem re support.
customer_reviews.author: ElectricGhost

customer_reviews.title: New, sealed, quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so only had the phone a few hours , but, it arrived quickly, new and sealed. On inspection and a quick search of the IMEI the phone is the Italian model - however (and this has been confirmed by Samsung themselves) the warranty stands in the UK and in UK service centres. In the box are some pretty nice headphones, micro usb to USB c adapter, UK plug and cable. Phone has charged no problem, and after a fair play around with it seems to be very nice !! Can't rate any battery life or anything however.... But considering when bought it was £250 cheaper than in high Street stores I am very pleased!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McNally

customer_reviews.title: Be Very Careful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the phone which was advertised as a uk version. When it arrived it was marked EU version no wrapping on the box but labels saying the firmware had been removed and replaced with uk firmware. This is a very expensive phone and I do not expect to receive a foreign phone converted to work in the UK. I feel it should be made clear in the advert exactly what you are buying and feel strongly that this advert is very misleading. I did not open the box but did an immediate return and am out of pocked by £8.50 postage in order that I could trace the return with insurance. I am extremely unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jeffrey M Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: As expected this is the flagship. Top notch quality. Waiting for my ear buds approval.
customer_reviews.author: Khan S.

customer_reviews.title: Foreign and reformatted
customer_reviews.text: Reviewed the phone. First clue something isn't right is that it is not shrink wrapped. Second clue is the "security seal" which says this phone was originally sold in a European country, but has been reformatted for the UK market. So I paid full price for a basically refurbised, foreign phone. It says nowhere when you buy it that it is a reformatted foreign phone. Returned without even breaking the newly added seal
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Non UK Stock - Be AWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Despite being advertised as "UK Version", this arrived today without plastic wrapping, but with a label suggesting this is imported from another European Country, the two pin plug replaced with a 3 pin UK plug and the firmware replaced with an English firmware. That is a lot of money for a non UK product, which, I suspect if anything were to wrong with it, Samsung would have an issue with. Return request and accepted within 10 minutes. Bit annoying that I have to pay for return postage. Still awaiting a refund a week later
customer_reviews.author: Skavitch

customer_reviews.title: Returning to Samsung phone... Why did I ever change!
customer_reviews.text: What do I like? Everything.... Honestly there is nothing to not like! Tried other top end phones and now regret that.... Going back to Samsung was like putting on your comfy slippers.... Samsung show Apple how they ought to be in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 5 years I thought it was time to give Samsung another chance, big mistake.
customer_reviews.text: Previous phone was a OnePlus, compared to my old phone the new phone is a disappointment, other than the screen. The fingerprint recognition is very, very poor. It will never unlock on the first attempt. Bixby is a waste of everyone's time. All the slight changes to standard Android appear to have been designed to make your life just a little bit more difficult. The screen is very clear, but often it flickers.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Goldsworthy

customer_reviews.title: Superior smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best smart phone I have ever owned! For all the great power users that love big screen entertainment and fast speeds and large battery lives, this is the phone for you. It's huge high quality screen beats any other smartphone screen with minimal distractions and interruptions it will make gaming and watching content absolutely amazing. With a battery that lasts all day and fast charging, you're always plugged in. Absolute must have.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Phones brand new just as advertised works perfectly even a year old phone it's speedy camreas are good every task i do it handles it like butter zero faults from the seller and Samsung themselves
customer_reviews.author: Chris Finlay

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: A new Samsung S10, boxed with all its components. It works fine, was delivered quickly and it was cheaper because it was green. I rather like the green but if you don't get a case.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Seriousness!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, it quickly and perfectly sealed. After 5 days it works perfectly, we'll see ...
customer_reviews.author: Irinel

customer_reviews.title: Great phone *****
customer_reviews.text: Cool it arrived and it's runnig smooth and feels nice ^^ Finger print works every time and it's nice placed ) Don't get any issue with power button, got a big hand CD Thanks to everyone for this phone ! YaY
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Great phone easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Good service, best phone I've had. I have had Samsungs all my mobile life. Only drawback is Samsung always push their apps etc. I prefer android
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say? I love this phone. I have never used an iphone so cannot compare but this particular phone is a life saver and I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Lovely phone.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my husband. I set it up for him. Was so simple. Lovely lay out on the phone itself. Arrived in good time. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy good phone so far
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for few hours. I am an android fan and get through too many. This seems a good one, much better then Google pixel xl3
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne moore

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished Phones Sold as New Ones
customer_reviews.text: -I Paid for a new phone and I've got refurbished / open delivered. -There was no VAT receipt inside Bubble Envelope or anything else, there was one box with the phone and that's it -Label Stating "DO NOT ACCEPT IF IT'S BROKEN" is Torn. -Dust under the foil Morale of the story is: Appliances Direct - UK Are Selling refurbished phones worth £400 for over £640
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: S10+
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to upgrade her S7 and she is well pleased with the phone, a very good delivery service from the seller
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Superb speed of delivery,  not UK Version though
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item and superb speed of arrival. Only 4 star due to being advertised as UK version, but it was German. Be aware however, that this is fine. You can easily change language on load up to English and once you've entered your SIM, Samsung Galaxy will change from German to english. Not really a problem, but could have been stated EU instead of UK version!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality phone and meets my expectations. Price is on the high side but would recommend to anyone who wants a phone with good quality parts, good battery and up to date software.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Phone, Good Delivery, Stain on Screen protect
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far, phone came in perfect conditions, security seal intact however the screen protect has to permanent stains on it, so that was taken off as soon as I saw the device.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone seller
customer_reviews.text: Flawless. I've used the phone since January 15th 2020 and I have no complaints at all! No scratches, speed is perfect, camera is perfect all is amazing! Cant tell if the screen has been changed and only way to check is in water but I'm not too keen to try. Amazing company! Definitely buy again soon
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best galaxy (so far)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mini computer (that includes an app to make a call). Use everyday to listen to music, internet, messages, pics, satnav, games,... & the odd call.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy and powerful, decent battery but minor scratch's.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed after long term usage it oddly can get scratched. Haven't had this issue with past Samsung phones.
customer_reviews.author: Guilty Spark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: Very happy girl today, thankyou for an awesome deal, and the extras I received inside the box, phone is stunning works a treat love it
customer_reviews.author: Mz Alisha Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but not this handset
customer_reviews.text: I had few issues with this particular phone, I always loved Samsung smartphones but this one wasnt the best unit!
customer_reviews.author: A Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: I came from a Note 9, but S10 plus is better. True, they have some minor problems from the moment, but I'm sure will be fixed soon. Especially night camera, which is not great for the moment.
customer_reviews.author: RobinNet

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful phone
customer_reviews.text: Beutiful phone! BEUTIFUL! very advanced well made anr really one off the best if not the best phone at the moment. And still have a headphone jack. Unbelievable phone. Wireless sharing. Everything. My most favorite purchase off the year.
customer_reviews.author: Unixar

customer_reviews.title: It's not the specified 'UK' version
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone as the UK version but when it came it weirdly enough came with a 3 pin plug outside of the phone box and had a 2 pin plug inside whilst saying this is a European model. But after using the phone anyway theres been nothing wrong with it and I can use my sim card well still, the battery life is very good and still a great phone
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great device. Converted from iPhone
customer_reviews.text: After always having used iPhones this is the only Android device that has converted me. Great device that has easy usability. Its light and doesn't feel as big as the XS Max even though it's pretty much the same size. Screen is awesome. Fingerprint scanner is a bit temperamental but apart from that this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Much better support!
customer_reviews.text: There was an issue with the GPS not working, but Samsung sent an engineer over and they replaced the faulty part free of charge!
customer_reviews.author: Grumtastic

customer_reviews.title: great phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: deliver was quick, the phone was in original packaging and everything worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same phone for over a year now. Can't fault it. Decided to purchase one for this fathers day. Father is over the moon. Quite an upgrade from the Galaxy S7! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: Great device, great condition
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device in "like new" condition as described. Was about to buy a next generation device and very glad I went with this one. Saved a heap of money and bought a device that doesn't seem to show any signs of wear or tear.
customer_reviews.author: Peter flint

customer_reviews.title: This is not just a phone it a great tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a phone and laptop, best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.author: AaronT

customer_reviews.title: Best phone by far
customer_reviews.text: Great phone one of the best I've had ... but wondering I get the ear buds they said you would get with it
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Not a UK phone
customer_reviews.text: The instructions in the phone case were in Latvian which was suspicious. I then tried to install Samsung pay (was not pre installed on the phone) and it would not allow me it do it which means the phone is from a different region. So beware if you want a UK phone with samsung pay this will not work!
customer_reviews.author: RSS

customer_reviews.title: S10+ ceramic back.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone for my needs and desires. I chose this model over a glass backed one as the ceramic back cover is supposed to be stronger. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Item descrition is inacurate
customer_reviews.text: Only given 3 starts as I've not tested the phone. I have no doubt the phone when I get my new one will be worth the wait. I returned mine as this item description is wrong. They are ceramic white not prism white.
customer_reviews.author: David Lydon

customer_reviews.title: Phone Samsung S10 plus
customer_reviews.text: Good product but comes with European plug and instructions in Italian.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Quick delivery. Genuine phone.
customer_reviews.text: Phone wasn't the UK version but Italian one. Still works fine with UK sims though. Make sure you call up Samsung UK to check the serial and IMEI numbers of the phone to make sure it's covered by the 2 year UK warranty. Mine was okay but would have returned it if it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another brilliant Samsung Galaxy.
customer_reviews.text: After years and years of faithful service, I finally upgraded my S6 to an S10+. Another fantastic phone, which I can easily see lasting me as many years as its predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Beswick

customer_reviews.title: This is not a uk phone
customer_reviews.text: These are not uk phones, they arrive with a separate uk charger, no uk instructions or warranty details you will have to firstly try and change the language, but after that you should be ok, not sure on the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN P.

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone mainly on the promise of a fantastic camera. Unfortunately the camera was so underwhelming I returned the phone. I felt like I was getting better point and shoot pictures with my s7.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sherratt

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint is faster now with the latest updates
customer_reviews.text: Camera is a beast, the display is an demon. Exynos procesor really does his job, very fast and smooth. A great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Pre-ordered but the free earphones is not there
customer_reviews.text: The phone is amazing but it was advertised as pre-order abd you will get a free wireless buds with it...
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Mahmoodi

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: great replacment for my old s8.. was a bit worried buying a refurbished phone, but it was like new when i received it, so will buy refurbs again
customer_reviews.author: j s cole

customer_reviews.title: Be careful buying from 3rd party sellers
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and turned out not to be brand new as stated and Italian with screen damage confirmed by Samsung directly returned through amazon and fully refunded
customer_reviews.author: john wilde

customer_reviews.title: Bit expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Phone looks and works great, ui is the best ever
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: I live the phone as a whole
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera the phone but the fingerprint is kinda slow
customer_reviews.author: Asadullah Siddique

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty much as Samsung say great screen quick, would like battery to las a little longer! But really quite good Camera great , thank you. SAMSUNG.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone love it !
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone overall its working nicely and camera is amzing battery life is amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Muzzi

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Broke s10 plus by leaving on car roof so have replaced with bigger memory version. Love 💘 so much
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone and can't fault it. It's a Samsung upgrade and it is the perfect size. Love the camera and the battery lasts ages. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good i recomend
customer_reviews.text: Separat uk power brick came slight damaged but wasnt a bother as i have hundreds of them otherwise all great
customer_reviews.author: bano

customer_reviews.title: Samsung S10+
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It came 3 days earlier and in immaculate condition with the manufacturer film on the back and front still on it. Really happy with my purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Dazzle

customer_reviews.title: I recomand
customer_reviews.text: The phone it's brand new! Just the box had a little scratch on the back side but i'm really pleased about the phone and it's working excelent!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Order page showed it will be arrived after Christmas but delivered next day after I ordered and new item is arrived as described. Recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Hasook Shin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product. Thanks for quick delivery. I will recommend everyone for this seller and definitely I will purchase from this seller in future
customer_reviews.author: Ganesh

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and it had italian soft ware and wouldnt up date. I bought is in december and am still trying go return and get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, the finger print reader is good but struggles to work if you've cut your finger. Overall a good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Only downfall is the size of the phone as it is quite big.
customer_reviews.author: Leena Patel

customer_reviews.title: You should  buy it  you won't  regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I still love this device , it's working very well the battery lasts longer than I thought it would! I'm really thankful for it !
customer_reviews.author: kasongo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not amused as my networks tell me that I won't be able to get 5G
customer_reviews.author: Visa

customer_reviews.title: Overall okay
customer_reviews.text: Been using the phone for about 1week,very nice and sleek,but the battery life isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it for the phone that you get
customer_reviews.text: Great device if you like big phones, tons of features, great looking display
customer_reviews.author: priam

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get in shops what I got from amazon
customer_reviews.text: The samsung s10+ is everything you need in one place
customer_reviews.author: graham harman

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone but manufacturer's seal ARRIVED broken
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this brand new phone, from the store (not the market place). Paid full price for it and what do I get? I get a Samsung s10+ minus it's factory vacuum wrap, the manufacturer's seal broken and it's been resealed with a circle of tape... Inside the box, there's the phone with none of the usual sticky stuff on the glass. There's no power supply, just the handset, usb-c dongle, micro USB adaptor, USB C cable and white ear phones (are they even sanitary?) For this reason, it's been rejected and returned. I'm sorry, if i'm gonna pay full price, I want it factory new, not resealed and sold as 'new'. I'm pretty sure other consumers would agree.
customer_reviews.author: MsNikita

customer_reviews.title: Docs not in English.
customer_reviews.text: Nowhete above does this say the documemtation is in a foreign language. When i buy a product in England, i expect the documentation to be in English! Also no key to open SIM drawer, fortunately I kept my S9 Plus key. It's charging now but hopefully i wont have to add to this.
customer_reviews.author: Ampers

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A PHONE PURE BEAUTY
customer_reviews.text: Amazing beast switched from apple for sure so smooth and slick everything about this phone is awesome must buy, fingerprint in screen is quick and fast even with wet hands Face ID is better than iPhone camera superb enjoying this
customer_reviews.author: ZHANAYAH

customer_reviews.title: Purchase without fear
customer_reviews.text: Just writing review to provide some clarification to others who might be considering buying this phone. I got thr device in one day vis secure DHL delivery, posted from London. Came sealed pack and the UK charger was inside. Imei is italian (no corona :) ). Have the phone for 2 weeks now and it works perfectly. Beautiful device and top of the line camera. Rest you can read reviews provided by others. Just wanted to provide my feedback to those hesitant after reading reviews.i was hesitant too as have never bought something so expensive from a third-party on Amazon. It was £100 cheaper than the Samsung store.
customer_reviews.author: Haroon

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone and good value. Bigger then the S10 so do not get mixxed up when ordering
customer_reviews.text: excellent display and cameras. Email and calendar app loaded not as intuitive as the LG G4, but adequate. The extra Bixby button can be annoying as I have not been able to disable it. Keep it clear of the clamps when you put the phone in a dashboard holder to use the phone as a satnav. Oversized phone so you need to get a larger case or holster, and protective case. The Olixar ArmourDillo prevents you dropping it because like many phones it is fairly slippery.
customer_reviews.author: CBreviews

customer_reviews.title: Superior Device
customer_reviews.text: Big screen easily seen, vibrant colour. Very adaptable camera for video and pictures. The device looses memory quickly and has to be managed with the in built system. This brings the phone quickly back to 100% The speed of the phone when it's at 100 % is marvellous. I upgraded from s6 edge to the 10+ It was really worth it. Just wish the memory & speed didnt have to be manually attended to so much.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_ user_

customer_reviews.title: Good seller, genuine product.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment, the phone was packaged exactly as I expected it woud be in an original box with the tamper seal undisturbed. I won't be reviewing the phone as you've plenty seen lots of those of your buying one of these! It's a big purchase that I wa slightly nervous about making from Amazon but there's been issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: NicheMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this galaxy phone as it has a big screen with a sharp and clear display and the performance is excellent. I also love the camera and the features it provides and how you get an ultra-wide lens. Overall, it's the best phone I've ever had. The only reason there's a star missing is because of the packaging. The amazon box had a bash at the side and felt slightly damp but the phone was undamaged and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: its a samsung, what else can I say
customer_reviews.text: I love samsung galaxy phones, so i bought the new s10 plus. I havent been disappointed yet. So easy to set up ,transferring contacts from my s9 plus. It has a finger print reader which I use all the time. The camera takes great pics and videos. I love it. I recommend this phone
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone speaks for itself. It's great. I brought this as a gift. However, the button on the right on the right of the phone keeps sticking. The button that locks the phone and turns it on and off. I have the S10 5G from Vodafone and didn't have any problems but this one from Amazon has the on and off button defect. ...other than that it's fine. Also,
customer_reviews.author: Miss R. Spencer-james

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Samsung have knocked the ball out of the park with this one.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I left the iPhone and went to Honor, and now I am with Samsung and this is a fantastic phone. It works, no problems, and just gets the job done. The battery life is amazing, and it charges super fast. The pictures it takes are phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sent back AMAZON SLOW AT THE REFUND STAGE
customer_reviews.text: Had had to send this back with a software problem freezing on BBC News AMAZON SLOW AT THE REFUND
customer_reviews.author: L. Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade on my Galaxy S6
customer_reviews.text: All as per reviews and spec. Great camera and the 3 lenses are really good. Face recognition and fingerprint work well and screen is super clear. After a pretty busy first day, battery is still at 50% so a great improvement. Very happy and a great price from K Mart
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Little bit of a let down
customer_reviews.text: Difficult ending a call as the screen goes off - the previous Samsung had the screen on when I’m on hands free. Also learn sounds are no longer a gradual volume increase
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Oreilly

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing it's certainly a step up from my previous phone which was the s8, but still better then iPhone 😀 The price was a bit off putting but screw it you only live once.
customer_reviews.author: M. O. Sharif

customer_reviews.title: S10
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is living her new phone, still finding out all about it. Loves the camera the phone has and all the detail that it can show, good quality
customer_reviews.author: DEE DEE

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S10+ Mobile Phone; Sim Free Smartphone - Prism Black (UK version)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Prism Black| Size Name:128GB| Style Name:UK Version| Pattern Name:SingleThe Galaxy S10+ is the ultimate expression of everything a phone should be. It’s the culmination of a decade of S series innovation. With 2 front cameras and 3 rear cameras, it captures moments exactly as you see them. A new ultra-wide and ultra-zoom lens lets you see the whole scene, and a front-facing portrait lens will help you take flawless photos. It’s even got an incredible screen-to-body ratio and packs a powerful battery. As one of our performance models, it comes in a premium Ceramic White and Ceramic Black, with the 512GB and 1TB models including an amazing 8GB RAM and 12GB respectively. Hybrid SIM variant.
feature_bullets: Smartphone innovation with an infinity-o display: minimal, beautiful and effortlessly elegant; with no home button, no notch for the receiver and a simple dot opening for the front camera, the Galaxy S10+ gives you an uninterrupted viewing experience

PowerShare: it gives you the superpower to share your power wherever you are, simply connect your Galaxy Watch or Galaxy Buds with the S10+ and charge them at the same time, or bring your friend's back to life
True Vision Camera: the Galaxy S10+ captures every moment exactly as you see it with 3 rear cameras, an ultra-wide lens and 2 front cameras

Sim-free smartphone with ultrasonic fingerprint scanner: the newest way to keep your Android phone and information secure, it reads every ridge and notch of your finger, and even performs in low temperatures and strong sunlight
Clear interface to make everything effortless: screens are uncluttered, icons pop with colour, the SmartThings app is already installed and we've even made it easier to use one-handed

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
